rooms.description: Two-car garage accommodating parking for two vehicles.
Entrance hall leading to garden and interior spaces. Includes a reception desk area and storage.
Open plan living room with seating arrangement and minimalistic decor adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Dining area integrated with the kitchen for seamless functionality. West-facing orientation supports evening views.

openings.description: Large window/door access to the garden, designed for natural light and breeze.
South facing large window providing ample daylight while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
West-facing balcony for evening relaxation and garden view.

levels.description: Ground floor plan featuring a two-car garage, entrance hall, living room, dining area. The layout emphasizes open space, natural lighting, and connection with the outdoor garden. Local building norms considered with Vastu alignments to ensure positive energy flow.
